## **Description**
The **Prefix-Suffix **operator allows to add of text before and after the input string, based on the configuration settings.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

String

The string to which you want to add a prefix or a suffix

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

String

The resulting string, including the added prefix and/or suffix.

## **![](data:image/png;base64,)****Settings**
- Select the **Prefix **checkbox to add a **Prefix value **to the string.

In the text field, enter the text that you want to add at the beginning of the string.

- Select the **Suffix **checkbox to add a **Suffix value **to the string.

In the text field, enter the text that you want to add at the end of the string.

- Click **Apply **to confirm.

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**NULL input (no input)**

The operator returns an empty string.
